member.name: P:DetectScreens.Properties.Resources.Program_Main_CompositionNotEnabled
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to This program needs Aero Glass, but it seems to be disabled. Click 'OK' to still open the program.
Warning: crashes may occur. Try at your own risk..

member.name: P:DetectScreens.Properties.Resources.Program_Main_CompositionNotEnabled_Title
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Aero Glass disabled.

member.name: P:DetectScreens.Properties.Resources.Program_Main_OSVistaOrHigher
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Your Operating System is not supported by this program. Try it on Windows Vista, Windows 7 and higher. Click 'OK' to still open the program.
Warning: crashes may occur. Try at your own risk..

member.name: P:DetectScreens.Properties.Resources.Program_Main_OSVistaOrHigher_Title
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to OS not supported.
